data.introduce: 国际变更费计算服务接口(AirIntlRepric)为用户提供了变更查询服务。
data.functions:
支持变更费计算
支持对国际Reshop结果进行验价
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_AirIntlRepriceInterRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代理人用户信息：代理人用户信息（都是必填项）","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PayType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付类型：CASH -- 现金支付 CC -- 信用卡支付 默认CASH","children":[]},{"name":"@ChannelID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"主机代码：CRS时是1E ICS时是航空公司两字代码","children":[]},{"name":"@IataCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"IataCode","children":[]},{"name":"@CityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"城市代码","children":[]},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"office 号：代理人 office 号","children":[]},{"name":"@DisplayPnrInfoInd","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TransactionCommand","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"TicketNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号：原票票号 9991234567890或 999-1234567890","children":[]},{"name":"ExchangeAirline","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"换开航司：换开航司","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客序号：多人PNR时必填","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerType","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"InvoluntaryIdentifier","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否自愿：true:非自愿 校验变更航段上是否有IRR标示； false:自愿","children":[]},{"name":"Endorsement","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"签注信息：true:签转到其他航司，非自愿签转时必填","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerCount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"多人 PNR 时必填","children":[]}]},{"name":"AirItinerary","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段信息(未飞的航段全部填写)：1、仅变更计算时，已飞航班和地面段可以不填写到FlightSegment中 2、验价（品牌/非品牌）时，对选定的reshop变更方案，需要拼写全行程，包括已使用航段，地面段可以不用传。航段信息需要按顺序传。可以根据reshop返回的选定的变更方案，获取到对应的ticketMask，再根据ticketMask的Coupon顺序索引flight进行填写。","children":[{"name":"OriginDestinationOptions","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发到达信息集合","children":[{"name":"OriginDestinationOption","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"出发到达信息","children":[{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"新行程航段信息","children":[{"name":"OperatingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"承运方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：MU）","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号（例如：1831）","children":[]}]},{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"起始地","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"三字码：验 价 时 取 DataLibrary/Flights/Flight/ArrivalAirport","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达地","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"Equipment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"机型","children":[{"name":"@AirEquipType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机型：如：773","children":[]}]},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司信 息：验 价 时 取 DataLibrary/Flights/Flight/MarketingCarrier","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票运价的 accountCode","children":[]}]},{"name":"BookingClassAvail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位","children":[{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位号：预订的舱位代码，仅支持1位或2位字母形式的舱位值，例如 Y，KA。不支持M1这样的子舱位，如需预订子舱位需按大舱位进行预订","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段序号：1、与旅客、ssr等信息关联，多航段时，编号请勿重复 2、品牌验价时必填，与运价信息对应在PriceVerification/Fares/Fare/CoveredSegments/Id填写此处的Id","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发日期和时间（类型：Date）","children":[]},{"name":"@FareBasis","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段的farebasis：品牌验价时不使用","children":[]},{"name":"@Status","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段状态：验价时： 已飞航段取票面航段座位状态，未飞航段取 PNR中航段订座状态","children":[]},{"name":"@NumberInParty","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@ArrivalDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达日期和时间（类型：Date）","children":[]},{"name":"@SegmentType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段类型：NORMAL-普通航段 OPEN-不定期航段 ARRIVAL_UNKOWN_ARN K 信息航段 一般只写 NORMAL","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]},{"name":"@Priority","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"范围 0~9，数值越小优先级越高，默认为 0","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlightSegmentRef","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息引用","children":[{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段信息标识","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标识","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"FareskyParameters","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"国际运价的参数","children":[{"name":"FareTypes","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票运价类 型，可指定一个或者多个：PUBLIC：公布运价 PRIVATE：私有/协议运价 IT_PUBLIC：IT 公布运价 IT_PRIVATE：IT 私有/协议 运价","children":[{"name":"FareType","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"AccountCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@AllowBlank","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票运价是否可以是其他运价：true：可以是其他运价； 
false:必须是此 
accountCode的运价","children":[]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票运价的 
accountCode","children":[]}]},{"name":"PassengerType","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票旅客类型：ADT/CNN/INF 等国际运价的标准旅客类型三字码","children":[]},{"name":"ExactPtcMatch","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否返回指定旅客类型的运价：true:仅返回指定旅客类型的运价","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Changeable","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Changeable","children":[]},{"name":"@CabinCombo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"多品牌运价返回：SAMB：查询同品牌 ALLB：查询跨舱等混合品牌 MULB：查询优先同品牌，没有时往上找高一级品牌 XXXX：TRR坐校验如果不是1-3的值报错CABINCOMBO IS INVALID","children":[]},{"name":"@Refundable","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Refundable","children":[]},{"name":"@Currency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码：新票的支付货币代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Waiver","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"豁免代码：01 DEATH 02 ILLNESS 03 ACT_OF_GOD 04 COURT_APPEARANCE 05 MILITARY 06 TOUR_PACKAGE 07 LACK_DOCUMENTATION","children":[]}]},{"name":"PriceVerification","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"验价信息：针对reshop结果进行品牌验价时填写 所有内容来自reshop搜索结果","children":[{"name":"Fares","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"reshop结果选定行程对应的全部运价","children":[{"name":"Fare","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价信息：reshop 结果中的 fare项,要进行验价的行程所对应的全部运价","children":[{"name":"RuleTariff","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价的 ruletariff","children":[]},{"name":"FareDataForReprice","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Fare信息","children":[]},{"name":"FareDataForDiagnostics","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Fare信息","children":[]},{"name":"Tier","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"tier：最多 4 位数字,品牌运价时必填","children":[]},{"name":"BrandName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"品牌名：品牌运价时必填","children":[]},{"name":"PrimeRbds","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"主RBD","children":[{"name":"Rbd","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Rbd","children":[]}]},{"name":"CoveredSegments","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价覆盖的所有航段","children":[{"name":"Id","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段序号：此运价所覆盖的航段 需要与AirItinerary/FlightSegment/RPH对应 可以通过选定的reshop变更方案，找到fare与flight的对应关系","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]}]

使用(如果有值，则此节点为true；
否则为false)","children":[]}]},{"name":"IsHistoryFare","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"采用的是历史运价/新运价(current：用换开计算时间，计算新行程运价
history：用旧票出票时间，计算新行程运价
original ticketing fare: 永久票出票时间，计算出的新行程运价和原运价相同（farebasis， amount等均相同）)","children":[]},{"name":"RepriceRate","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"换开汇率","children":[{"name":"FromCurrency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码(新票的 更次数(包含此次变更），如果变更手续费为0，且变更航段包含航司指定的舱位，免费变更次数+1","children":[]}]},{"name":"FareDiff","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"变更的差价(各项差值可能有负值；Amount节点支持负值)","children":[{"name":"BaseFareDiff","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票面差价(以原票支付货币记录）","children":[{"name":"Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Currency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"RepriceFareDiff","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票面差价
